title: Leaks hint at Operator-like tool in ChatGPT ahead of GPT-5 launch

title: xAI prepares Grok 4 Code as it plans to take on Claude and Gemini

title: Police dismantles investment fraud ring stealing €10 million
summary: The Spanish police have dismantled a large-scale investment fraud operation based in the country, which has caused cumulative damages exceeding €10 million ($11.8M). [...]
